Sentence.value: The Ham test is a blood test done to diagnose paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[Ham test|C0430257]] is a [[blood test|C0018941]] done to diagnose [[paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria|C0024790]] (PNH).

Sentence.value: The Ham test can also be used to diagnose another rare disorder called congenital dyserythropoietic anemia.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[Ham test|C0430257]] can also be used to diagnose another [[rare disorder|C0678236]] called congenital dyserythropoietic anemia.
